response.overview: The documentary ISHE, focusing on drag culture, captures the inner journey and growth experience of a drag performer. It also offers an indirect perspective on the real-life situations of the LGBTQ+ community in China. Centering on the origin and development of drag culture, the film extends to the intervieweeâ€™s sense of powerlessness when confronting family issues, as well as the warmth they find within the drag family.
response.title: ISHE
